name: VZVirtualMachine.State
desc: The execution states of the VM.

items.name: case paused
items.desc: The framework has paused a started VM.

items.name: case error
items.desc: The virtual machine encountered an error.

items.name: case starting
items.desc: The VM is configuring the hardware preparing to run.

items.name: case resuming
items.desc: The VM is resuming from a paused state.
